content.en: Petrophysical algorithms: Algorithms are being used to estimate various petrophysical properties in the field of geophysics. These algorithms utilize different types of data, such as resistivity logging data, borehole array-induction logs, wireline formation tester and induction logging measurements, and more. By applying these algorithms, researchers are able to accurately estimate properties like porosity, permeability, gas saturation, formation resistivity, and even assess flow-related properties of tight-gas sandstones.
content.da: Petrofysiske algoritmer: Algoritmer bruges til at estimere forskellige petrofysiske egenskaber inden for geofysik. Disse algoritmer anvender forskellige typer data, såsom resistivitetsloggingsdata, borehuls-array-induktionslogninger, wireline formationstester og induktionslogningsmålinger, og mere. Ved at anvende disse algoritmer kan forskere nøjagtigt estimere egenskaber som porøsitet, permeabilitet, gaskætning, formationsresistivitet og endda vurdere strømningsrelaterede egenskaber af stramme gassandsten.
